pages.text: Mma Lahum Bihi Min `Ilmin Wa La Li'aba'ihim Kaburat Kalimatan Takhruju Min 'Afwahihim 'In Yaquluna 'Illa Kadhibaan
Fala`allaka Bakhi`un Nafsaka `Ala 'Atharihim 'In Lam Yu'uminu Bihadha Al-Hadithi 'Asafaan
Inna Ja`alna Ma `Ala Al-'Arđi Zinatan Laha Linabluwahum 'Ayyuhum 'Ahsanu `Amalaan
Am Hasibta 'Anna 'Ashaba Al-Kahfi Wa Ar-Raqimi Kanu Min 'Ayatina `Ajabaan
Idh 'Awa Al-Fityatu 'Ila Al-Kahfi Faqalu Rabbana 'Atina Min Ladunka Rahmatan Wa Hayyi' Lana Min 'Amrina Rashadaan
Thumma Ba`athnahum Lina`lama 'Ayyu Al-Hizbayni 'Ahsa Lima Labithu 'Amadaan
Nahnu Naqussu `Alayka Naba'ahum Bil-Haqqi 'Innahum Fityatun 'Amanu Birabbihim Wa Zidnahum Hudaan
Wa Rabatna `Ala Qulubihim 'Idh Qamu Faqalu Rabbuna Rabbu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Lan Nad`uwa Min Dunihi 'Ilahaan Laqad Qulna 'Idhaan Shatataan
Ha'ula' Qawmuna Attakhadhu Min Dunihi 'Alihatan Lawla Ya'tuna `Alayhim Bisultanin Bayyinin Faman 'Azlamu Mimmani Aftara `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan
